stories.text:
It must support "unsend" feature.

I prefer free versions, but given the features I'm asking, I understand that some apps might not be free, which is ok as long as there's guarantee that my data isn't used as yet another revenue stream for app developers.

stories.text:
Hey guys, coming from a JavaScript/nodejs background. Haven't touched something OOPy in years. I was wondering if any of you veterans could recommend solid resources that have helped you. I'm trying to get up to speed within a week enough to be able to do some basic features.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: You have 1 week to get as good as possible at Ruby. What do you do?
